general: Operating Conditions: -30 °C ~ 60 °C (-22°F ~ 140 °F) humidity 95% or less (non-condensing) Power Supply: 12 VDC ± 10%, PoE (802.3af) Power Consumption: Max. 5.5W (max. 7W with ICR on) Impact protection: IEC60068-2-75Eh, 20J; EN50102, up to IK10 Weather Proof: IP66 IR Range: Approx. 30 meters Dimensions: Φ140 x 99.9 mm (Φ 5.51” x 3.94”) Weight: 1000g
